website_summaries.verdict: Seventh Generation's formula cleans tough stains without all the toxins.
pros: This formula is concentrated, saving money and materials
It also comes with a nifty mechanism that measures the right detergent doses
The scent is mild, but pleasant enough to notice
cons: The measurement mechanism doesn't always work well

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic! Why? Let's see: 1) it uses plant-based detergents and still gets my family's clothes cleaner than any other detergent we've tried 2) it does not irritate skin, 3) it is incredibly easy to use (you really can dispense exactly what you need with one hand) 4) it is much more environmentally friendly because you're not paying the manufacturer to ship you a jug of water and 5) it lasts forever. I would give six stars if I could! Bravo 7th Gen!
customer_reviews.author: H. Popick

customer_reviews.title: I like the concentration but I don't trust the EasyDose cap.
customer_reviews.text: At first the EasyDose cap seemed easy enough, but the more I use it, the less certain it seems. The muscleheads in my family can too easily fill the detergent compartment without batting an eye, which leads to sudsy towels and decreased savings for the planet and my bank account. I feel like I'd have to practice over a bowl to get a feel for exactly how the EasyDose cap works. It feels easier to just eyeball a tablespoon of the stuff and lecture my family to do the same. Overall, nice idea, just not a fool-proof execution.
customer_reviews.author: N. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: I Won't Buy Anything Else
customer_reviews.text: I love this concentrated laundry soap. The proper amount squeezes out perfectly every time. It's also easy on my joints, not having to grab a larger bottle. Finally, the concentrated detergent in a small bottle is better for the environment. I won't buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: wine4jac

customer_reviews.title: Not a great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are dish detergent sized and there's no way one squirt will clean a small load of laundry. I have a small apartment sized stack and for colors 3 and whites 2. Don't expect suds but they come out clean. Not sure I would buy this again for $23 but the two small bottles fit well under my small kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bee

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and ineffective
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is terrible. I used I for the first time tonight and even using a double dose on a normal sized load of wash my shirts still smell of sweat in the armpits, and none of them were heavily soiled either. It is overpriced crap, because it’s “natural”, and I’m shipping it back for a refund tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: PaigeMarin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Washing Soda, Borax, and White Vinegar and my clothes were looking a bit dingy. Switching to this has brightened my clothes and I really love the self measuring.
customer_reviews.author: DJShip

customer_reviews.title: Use less Save more
customer_reviews.text: My go to laundry detergent for the last year. You only need a small squirt which is controlled by the spout. Lasts long time and is great for sensitive skin. No chemicals like other detergents so keep clothes looking newer longer.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is my jam!
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of that bubblegum flavored ACT mouthwash from my childhood. You squeeze the bottle and the top cup fills up. This stuff is amazing. Subscribe and Save AND AmazonSmile eligible. This stuff cleans great and has no smell - what clean REALLY smells like! I used to use the jug, but this fits so much better in apartment life and you'll never have the drippy cap problem. You just squeeze into the tray or tub until it stops. If it's a really dirty load you h as very to do it a whole 2 times, so strenuous, amiright?
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love this concentrated, compact laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of seventh generation laundry detergent and wanted to love the concentrated, compact packaging. Early on the automatic squeeze feature stopped working so I had to eye the pours. I think I ended up using too much and did not get the maximum advertised uses from it. I would purchase seventh generation again just not with this concentrated packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: The best for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is fabulous. It does a great job cleaning my clothes and towels and sheets with absolutely no scent. I have found I am allergic and this detergent has been great for me. It took many tries to get it right. I love these concentrated bottles. SO much better than lugging around that massive bottle with the spout. Thank you 7th Gen.
customer_reviews.author: E. Marcucci

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the whole measured dispensing method, but it works great! So simple! I use this in combination with the SG oxy booster and my clothes come out clean (which is saying something because my HE washer is pretty crap at cleaning clothes 🙄). Also, the bottle lasts so long. Crazy long...which means less packaging overall. Yay.
customer_reviews.author: Erica K

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Product
customer_reviews.text: The Easy Dose system doesn't work. And when I measured it (.35 fl. oz/ small load) it doesn't clean. In addition, my fleece clothes had a LOT of dried gray matter on them that required the use of most of a lint roller to get that crud off. After using regular Seventh Generation liquid soap for about 4 years, I am realizing it really doesn't clean; it maybe refreshes clothes. But if you have dirty clothes, they come out of the wash still dirty. I have been testing Shaklee's laundry detergent against Seventh Generation and there's no comparison. Shaklee does a far superior job of cleaning. I'm going back to Shaklee.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Masko

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: I was a Tide user for years. I tried several detergents to find something that is more environmentally friendly and good for sensitive skin. I also have a few family members sensitive to scent. This product ticks all the boxes. It cleans as well as Tide with no smells or irritation. It is also a great value since each bottle is 66 loads.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love the dispenser
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser system is so easy, saves time, and doesn’t drip detergent everywhere. I also love this detergent bc it has no fragrance and cleans my clothes well. I was buying this detergent anyway, but their new bottles are amazing and I will continue to buy it in these new bottles
customer_reviews.author: dbt

customer_reviews.title: Developed a rash from this one!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the easy dose squeeze but when 3 out of 5 of us started developing a rash, I realized that this is not the same as the Seventh Generation free and clear detergent out of the big container! Different ingredients makes a big difference! Be aware!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Product did not arrive as photographed.
customer_reviews.text: The two bottles have a plain squirt type lid. Not a dispenser, premeasured lid as described. So I am measuring the correct amount by squirting product into measuring cup and then pouring into wash. Not at all what was pictured. Sort of a pain and extra step when I was previously purchasing the pods that you just toss into the wash. With that being said, so far the product has worked satisfactory. Amazon had an option to return product but not comment on product. I still wanted to try it so I didn’t return product.
customer_reviews.author: Ritamc

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent, but the bottle doesn't do what it's supposed to, I can never actually get 66 loads of laundry out of these bottles, way too much comes out even though it's not supposed to... So this time I was excited to get the new bottle type, but I was pretty disappointed to find that I still received the old style of bottle despite being led to believe I would get the newer more accurate dosing lid. I almost want to exchange for the product I thought I was receiving, but I wouldn't feel confident that I would receive what I expected still....
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lee

customer_reviews.title: Left my clothes smelling dirty
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a 2-Pack of Seventh Generation Easy Dose Laundry Detergent and am very dissatisfied with it's effectiveness. After washing with this detergent, using as recommended or even in higher amounts, I have found my clothes still smell dirty. As a test I washed two similar loads one with this detergent and another with a different brand and the difference was remarkable. I now have 1 and 1/2 bottles of this detergent which I am not able to use. The bottle is cool, but the detergent just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: WeeHaw

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The detergent cleans as expected but the easydose feature doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was terrible with detergent leaking all over the place.
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent and was so disappointed when I picked the package up from my porch. I can't believe that they are making me return this mess before they will replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Nosal

customer_reviews.title: Thank you 7th!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Seventh Generation laundry soap for a while. I hate smell, but want clothes clean, this works! So, when this concentrated "easy-dose" bottle came out I jumped on it. Thank you for WAY less plastic, and an awesome dispenser that works.
customer_reviews.author: Dy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, cleans the clothes, no perfumery scents and easy stop flow. Love the product. Had used another brand for many years and now a believer with this laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: dbe

customer_reviews.title: No result
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I mean, i understand that less aggressive detergent is less effective. But didn't expect it is not effective AT ALL. I literally pulled my staff of the washing machine with the same stains and same smell as before washing it%) And it is not some "hard stains". Crazy, i've never seen something like this before.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Product I’ll use for sure, just wish the auto dose works..
customer_reviews.text: I still haven’t figured out if the cap really has that so called ‘ auto dose technology ‘. It doesn’t seem to stop with one squeeze. Guess I’ll go back to using the OG method...
customer_reviews.author: P. Liew

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and great shipping.
customer_reviews.text: This is super concentrated and a great buy. No scent. The bottles came extremely well packaged, with the cap area well-wrapped with tape. No leaks! Delivered in one day.
customer_reviews.author: Music fan

customer_reviews.title: Go Sevinth generation
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product. I am a big fan of Sevinth Generation. The portion control on this bottle makes life easier and the small bottles save space. I have sensitive skin and have not had any problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Theaprilshow

customer_reviews.title: Beware leaky bottles.
customer_reviews.text: Shipment arrived with one bottle partially unscrewed at the tip. Resulted in a mess to clean up. There are serious design issues with the top.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Feng

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: That new dispensing lid is just not working. Definitely disappointed. I thought I would be getting 66 loads out of these bottles. I think I’m gonna get about 30 if I’m lucky. I’m gonna count how many I get in the next bottle to see since I purchased 2. Stay tuned...,
customer_reviews.author: Samuel E May

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best packaging of detergent I’ve seen. Very convenient to use: - light (it’s a concentrate) - no measure cup needed, when you use it it stops the flow automatically at 1 load Allegedly it’s also eco schmeco. Can’t confirm that. Smells well, washes well. No allergies when I use for my baby clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Shabaldin

customer_reviews.title: This is a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this. I will buy this again. I will try another scent.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Gentle. Effective.
customer_reviews.text: Good on my sensitive skin. No scent which I like. Easy to dispense...even better! Less packaging. Why don’t all detergents come concentrated like this?
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: What a great concept! Great detergent with class-leading convenience! So much better than every space-stealing alternative. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: ALY

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this soap. Also love the measured dose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Washes out colors, doesn’t fight stains/
customer_reviews.text: I love seventh generation products, but I am not a fan of this. I really feel like it has no stain fighting power, and it seems to wash the color out of our clothes. I will be going back to the seventh gen unscented pour style. I never had issues with that one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lanz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not good for sensitive skin my daughter still broke out and I seriously does not clean clothes at all!! I mean stuff was still crusted on bibs and it didn’t even touch it! Going back to dreft!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Eller

customer_reviews.title: Love the squeeze bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this squeeze bottle. Cleans clothes well. Will be my new go-to laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Denizen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love that it measures for you!!!! Works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Levinery

customer_reviews.title: Love the easy dose!
customer_reviews.text: I've been very pleased so far with the detergent. Easy to use and safe for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Atredes

customer_reviews.title: Finally found one
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I finally found a laundry detergent that goes well with my 1 year olds skin! Will continue buying
customer_reviews.author: iisstill

customer_reviews.title: Auto dispense... brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: I love the auto dispense! Makes it so easy to add to the wash load!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Ecofriendly win
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have scent. Works well. Easy to dispense. Ecofriendly win
customer_reviews.author: El Flaco

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Works great but it doesn’t measure well. Pay too much to be earth friendly
customer_reviews.author: Don Mayville

customer_reviews.title: EasyDose not easy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Seventh Generation for years & love their product. I don't love the EasyDose. Not easy & not working at all with my first bottle. I squeeze & it never stops. Won't be buying EasyDose again. I'll be going back to measuring.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The automatic dosing feature worked like a charm. It didn't dispense very much, but it turned out to be plenty. Filled the machine (oooolllld top loader) with suds. Got the clothes clean.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Easy dose cap did not work
customer_reviews.text: 1st bottle was half empty after 10 doses. Switched to 2nd bottle and it was half empty after about 20 doses. Easy dose cap is a good idea, but it just didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: It is okay, but I’m not going to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as a two pack
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a two pack. I paid 25.00 for one bottle? Plus, they did not secure the top, so it leaked out into the packaging and I lost a lot of the product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: dawn zelek

customer_reviews.title: Great caps!
customer_reviews.text: Love the cap on these. It stops you at right amount for one load. Exactly what I wanted, and the detergent works great, too.
customer_reviews.author: just a dude

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Received package and it was soaked with detergent cap was have way off on one bottle.... Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: YMG

customer_reviews.title: great dispenser
customer_reviews.text: great easy to use. dispenses automatically so you don't have to measure. i love it
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Love that it cuts down on waste and the auto measurement makes use a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ostenso

customer_reviews.title: defective dispensing mechanism
customer_reviews.text: doesn’t dispense as advertised leading to product waste and laundry debacle (multiple rinses required). ordered the 2 pack and both are faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Weston Rice

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturer says you get 66 loads, but you only get 50.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Turpenoff

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 2 bottles of the free and clear in November of 2019 and I am now about half way thru my second bottle and it’s March. I am a single girl, but I still do a lot of laundry. I can’t speak for the scent I use free and clear, but next time I’m going to try the lavender. Does it clean? I haven’t noticed any difference in cleaning compared to other regular detergents. It’s definitely worth not have to constantly run to the store for soap!
customer_reviews.author: LoriPittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: Easy, no mess dosing and cleans great.
customer_reviews.text: This all-natural detergent works very well, and has no synthetic color or fragrance added. We used to have to use the scentless "Free and Clear" detergents due to some members of the household having sensitive skin, but this detergent works just as well and hasnt caused any skin issues with anyone. The packaging is very innovative. The detergent is super concentrated and you only need a few tablespoons per load. The bottle has a dosing lid, so all you have to do is give the bottle a good squeeze and it stops the flow when youve squeezed out enough. Also the bottles are probably 1/4th the size of a normal detergent jug so less packaging too.
customer_reviews.author: Doodle™

customer_reviews.title: Great soap but don’t trust the dispenser
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser is not working on either bottle. Wasted lots and still don’t know how much to use. The box arrived with a light product leak from one bottle cap. The soap seems great but it says to tip and squeeze and it will measure. It does not stop at correct amount as instructed. I probably used 10x the amount before realizing it would just keep squirting.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewerdw56

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I used this religiously and love it. Such a small bottle and perfect portioned amounts! I will start itching it other detergents like Tide even the sensitive no fragrance types and natural ones as well. This detergent does it’s job without any of the issues I’ve had with other detergent. The bonus is that it’s eco friendly with the smaller bottle but more washes! Cleans very well.
customer_reviews.author: Justpeachy85

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: I've tried the lavander scent but you can barely smell it so I went ahead and got this one and although you can't smell anything your clothes come out smelling clean, not coin laundry chemical clean but just a fresh pure clean scent which is good for those withh sensitivities or allergies. I also like the dispenser, I don't have to worry about measuring the amount needed and the bottle is not heavy at all making it easy for kids, older people or someone with weak wrists to use without help.
customer_reviews.author: X.D

customer_reviews.title: 7th Generation helps the Earth
customer_reviews.text: Finally, someone is listening in the detergent and home cleaning product world. I've used other products by 7th Gen. and liked them. I just tried this detergent, and it cleaned all types of laundry well. I have an HE washer, and using the squeeze topped bottle was convenient and easy. Concentrated on just the ingredients to clean, not a lot of fragrances, no dyes, and no harmful chemicals. So far, we like it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Protects me from overuse
customer_reviews.text: Have used other concentrations of this brand for quite a while. Does a great job cleaning with no irritation. NOW with the new "dispenser" all you do is invert & squeeze...just the right amount every time. Now I get the 200+ loads and save what I should! Good product. Great delivery mechanism!
customer_reviews.author: Chef903

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly...this actually WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed to find my 4X concentrate to be missing from Amazon, and this "seemed" to be the replacement. So I got it and used it mixed with my 4X or used twice as much. TODAY I decided to just use one squeeze in the wash. The load was in a stackable apartment size machine...and it worked. My clothes came out clean and fresh. So...I finally threw away the empty 4X bottle. This is my go-to eco laundry detergent. Thanks Amazon for stocking it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jack

customer_reviews.title: Faulty automatic stop valve
customer_reviews.text: I want to eventually go plastic-free. In the meantime, this seemed like a good transitional product to use less plastic. Unfortunately, I can’t figure out how to the get valve that automatically measure and stop the soap flow from working. I have been just eyeballing the amount which defeats the purpose of getting this product.
customer_reviews.author: Euginia Paik

customer_reviews.title: great laundry soap
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the 7th Generation various laundry soaps for a couple years, now. I have used the liquid and the drop in powder packs, but when I did the math, the price on this iteration of the soap couldn't be beat. I tried it, and it's now my favorite to use. Ultra concentrated, convenient sized packaging and it does as good of a job as the other varieties of 7th Generation laundry soap.
customer_reviews.author: TDB

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: Already used and loved the detergent so when I saw there was a version that supposedly portioned out there detergent for you, I was intrigued. So far, the feature has worked perfectly! You squeeze the bottle and it stops when the right amount comes out.
customer_reviews.author: pa

customer_reviews.title: Clever Dispensing System, Though I Wish It Were More Flexible
customer_reviews.text: When Mountain Green went out of business, I had to find new laundry detergent for the first time in a decade. Well, I settled on this and it works. The clothes get clean, and I do like the squirting measure dispenser system. I do wish there were a way to have a half-dose, however, for when doing small loads.
customer_reviews.author: Big Picture

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and not messy
customer_reviews.text: The bottle and the way you dispense it are amazing. So small, easy to hold with one hand and a simple squeeze dispenses the right amount. The detergent works well, there is no smell and clothes get clean. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We exclusively use this soap and cleaning products. This concentrate version is perfect for college kids and the dispenser helps conserve waste so really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I have skin issues and need the free and clear products to reduce issues from soaps and perfumes etc. this hits the mark on all accounts for me. It does great on the wash. Loved the concentrate as it reduces amount used, and landfill waste,
customer_reviews.author: J. Needham

customer_reviews.title: Great product that works
customer_reviews.text: Laundry soap washes clothes well and is highly concentrated-one small squirt is all it takes for a full load, leaves no residue and all items are CLEAN! Also uses minimal recyclable packaging, while still sadly in plastic, it’s less than most!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2three

customer_reviews.title: Does not clean well...
customer_reviews.text: we found that Seventh Generation did not clean our clothes well. The packaging is awesome, but not worth our clothes not cleaning well.
customer_reviews.author: Donnelsl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent concentrated HE laundry detergent from Seventh Generation!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent concentrated HE laundry detergent from Seventh Generation! I’m so happy with the ease of use, there’s no pouring from the jug into the cup then the washer, just a quick squeeze -which is premeasured - and you’re good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Davall

customer_reviews.title: "Easy dispensing cap" was defective
customer_reviews.text: The 1st bottle worked fine. But the "easy dispensing cap" on the 2nd bottle must've been defective. Used 1/3 of the bottle in 3 washes (when it should last 66 washes). I'm frustrated and want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this detergent but after a couple months of use my clothes are getting a musty smell like they're not getting completely clean.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Stew

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap
customer_reviews.text: Great soap smells nice gets laundry clean and all it takes is just a squeese
customer_reviews.author: lori bowden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome measuring system
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it's not enough but its very concentrated. Works great on our clothes
customer_reviews.author: J. stapleton

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: as described - good wash - easy to use - no scent
customer_reviews.author: Adela Cortez

customer_reviews.title: So smart
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. Very small footprint on the shelf and stays clean.
customer_reviews.author: thejadecar

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Seventh generation is one of our favorite brands in household cleaning products
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Does not dispense the proper amount.
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this. I thought it worked properly in the beginning, but now it dispenses over 15 mls (instead of 10) every time.
customer_reviews.author: clarrissa

product_meta.title: Seventh Generation Laundry Detergent, Ultra Concentrated EasyDose, Free & Clear, 23 oz, 2 Pack, 132 Loads (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Free & ClearLife is complicated. Laundry shouldn't be. With Seventh Generation's new Easy Dose Ultra Concentrated Laundry Detergent, you get the right amount of liquid-every time. Just flip the bottle, give a firm squeeze, and you're done. One squeeze is all your need! Our compact 23oz bottle gives you the same 66-load convenience you expect, but uses 60% less plastic, 50% less water, and is 75% lighter than our 100 fl oz bottle. A USDA Certified Bio based Product 99% made with an advanced-enzyme formula that fights tough stains, it's a great choice for your busy family. Easy to use, easy to store, and easy to love-our Ultra Concentrated Laundry Detergent is about to change the way you think about clean.
feature_bullets: Ultra-concentrated, ultra-convenient laundry detergent: 66 loads in a compact 23oz bottle that's easy to store, and easy to feel good about
Our Easy Dose Auto Dosing Technology measures the right amount-every time. Just flip the bottle, give a firm squeeze, and you're done. One squeeze is all you need
Small dose, big clean: 60% less plastic, 50% less water, and 75% lighter than our 100 fl oz bottle
Our advanced-enzyme formula fights even the most stubborn stains
Made with 0% dyes, fragrances, or artificial brighteners

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
